column5: Nice work guys!!!

Left the house waaaay to early this morning,  brainstorming that we would try to hit a certain creek before the rain blows it over by mid morning...Well we timed it good but the water level came up way to quick and totally shut down the steel... Fished it until about 8:30 and decided it was time to hit another river. As we were packing up , the new addition BillM flops a drift right by the slack water and gets a big take down, FISH ON....After the hook set,  all that Berge , Silvio and I saw was crazy bulldogging !!!....No big runs or jumps , but Bill's rod was bowed right over getting crazzy headshakes from this fish.... Low and behold, after about 5 mins, he finally gets its head up and all I saw was a huge KYPE.... BIG BROWN COMIN DOWN !!!  a little more back and forth and he landed the chunky male brown for a pic.....This thing had one crazy Kype, I named it HALLOWEEN BROWN, as it was a  tad scarry looking, LOL    Stopped by Tim's for a coffee and some food before getting back out in the terential downpour at trib # 2 ... I have been soaked before , but today was rediculous... Fishing was slow, but we managed a few before the rain blew us out ....  Poor Silvio , hooked into a huge buck that B lined up the pool jumping and splashing... This thing was fresh, and had probably come in the river over night.. He held on for a little , but the fish broke him off soon after... best / biggest fish of the day, by far... you'll get him next time Sil !!!  Here's the few we landed before the river got blown out bad..... Looks like everything it gonna be washed out until the middle of next week...Its a good , thing cause I need some sleep !!!
that 2nd spot is a beauty if it's the same one im thinkin of....looks familiar....either way nice lookin fish you got today fellas! that is one huge kype on that brown...good goin fellas!   Hawk
Nice fish guys!  Good to see BillM get some chrome.  That is one mean looking brown.

Good job boys, Bill my man I hope you enjoyed yourself you did well I was happy to donate my fish to you lol. I got my ass handed to me today next time all get some pics. I am sure Bill had to change his pants when he saw my fish high jump his line and b line faster then I could react Bill this is what makes you roll out of bed. Bill you did well and that brown is one of a kind hope you enjoyed yourself. And BBnotty it's a shame you didn't land your hog that fish had to be mid teens. once again boys another good day on the tribs next time all get one on the bank no long distance releases lol.
wow. Sounds like u guys had a blast! Ive gotta learn that damn centre pin! lol. Congrats Bill for rocking that sick looking brown.  Pachone!
Hi,  I think i saw you guys on that certain creek.  Were there 4 of you?  I wish i had the same luck as you guys. I got skunked.   :wallbash:

We had a great time out there. its always nice to get out and hit some fish with good friends. That brown Bill landed had nice colours but that mouth is going to give me nightmares. Love those pictures Dave . Silvio we both had fish beat us up today, maybe next time we get them back.
Excellent Brown and some nice Steelies!!!
GCD chime in on a Steelhead post   WOW !!!!!....now I feel special.  I was expecting a bash reply with something to do with "marshmallows"
Great report and pics JDMLS  That brown on the first pic sure is scary looking Great job guys and thanks for sharing Leechman

I had a blast with you guys, Silvio you crack me up man.  Remind me to make sure that I am to your right the next time we go fishing, I saw my life flash before my eyes a few times today   Weather was horrible but the company couldn't be beat.. I really thought that was a Chinny until we got a real good look at her..   All I can remember is Dave saying, "I've only seen 2 %$#damn Chinnys in here all year!!"  All you guys were super helpful today, from answering my questions to helping me out on what to do once I got a fish on.  It tell ya, it was nice to see the float go down for once!
Lookit that shnaws on the brown!!  WTG lads.  The weather was not fit for man nor beast for us this morning..  We got skunked, save a butt load of river shinners..  cheers HD
WOW......That brown looks like a pitbull!!  Congrats Bill,great catch   Streamerguy
Bill the firextinguisher in the garbage yet lol.
I UPS'd it to your house man, you should be getting it soon
hole lol no worries all send it back soon when you need it . When you getting the shirt Bill?
Good to see you guys out there today.  I managed to land three nice ones down from where I met you, all on artificials.
Sweet shot, jdmls.  Look at the colours on the fish!  Are you sure you didn't distort the kype on that brown? that things beak is wicked!!!    p.-
*Insert Jaws theme music here*
Great report! Like the psychedelic backgrounds as well. That's a wicked mouth on that brown, congrats Bill. Thanks for posting. ehg
Great report guys....I love the look of that Brown!!
lol, nice fish man.

Bill, for the luv of God !!!! Please don't make me look at the picture of the Halloween Brown in your avtar pic. Its giving me chills down my spine   ...Pick any picture, just please don't remind me of that scarry KYPE...  I wish it was my reel in this one.. I am a tad jealous as to how good this shot came out..

Big brown coming down!!!!!!!!!!!  That pic is awesome, actually all the pics you took that day turned out really good.  If you have any high res ones, could you email them to me?  We'll have to get out again soon, hopefully the rain (snow up here) takes a break and the water levels get back down to normal.
Great going guys . . . Bill nice to see you fishiung with 'family'  (Dave)
